attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this is in response to the 'make Jeremy Clarkson PM' petition. 
My shoe is a size 9 black leather upper having some scuff marks and no innate intelligence.
My shoe is therefore a perfect candidate to compete with Clarkson for the job of PM...

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
